title: Training Content Analyst (Video-Based)
job_overview:
We’re hiring someone who can watch business training videos, extract the valuable information, and organize it into clear, structured summaries.

This is not just note-taking — we need someone who can comprehend, organize, and break down what’s being taught.

???? Responsibilities:
 • Watch business/mentorship videos
 • Extract all key information, step-by-step instructions, strategies, and key takeaways
 • Organize that info into structured documents (SOPs, checklists, summaries, etc.)
 • extracting/downloading videos


? Ideal Candidate:
 • Pays extreme attention to detail
 • Can deeply comprehend video content (not just surface-level)
 • Thorough, organized, and can follow instructions
 • Tech-savvy enough to extract or download videos
 • Self-motivated and can complete work without daily check-ins

???? Pay:
 • $400 Flat Rate
 • Project expected to last 3 weeks
 • High performers may be offered an extended role helping turn this material into full training programs
To apply:
Send your First Name + (RedBaby) as the subject line.      Example: John(RedBaby)
If you have any sample notes or similar work, include that too.
